title: L'Oreal Paris EverCurl Hydracharge Shampoo, 8.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Quenches and softens perfecting each curl's shape. Infuses hydrating nourishment without weigh-down. Curls are softer, more manageable without frizz. Its rich lather and natural aromatic properties help invigorate the senses.

title: L'Oreal Paris EverCurl Hydracharge Conditioner, 8.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Quenches and nourishes perfecting each curl's shape. Infuses hydrating nourishment without weigh-down. Curls are softer, more manageable without unwanted frizz. Natural aromatic properties help invigorate the senses.
